channel.title: Problem with Testing New Client
channel.description:
when i load it, i got this message
java.lang.NoSuchMethodException: client.main([Ljava.lang.String;) at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethod(Class.java:1937) at com.exe4j.runtime.LauncherEngine.launch(Unknown Source) at com.exe4j.runtime.WinLauncher.main(Unknown Source)
Can someone tell me how to fix this so my client works?

item.title: Problem with Testing New Client
item.dc:creator: @awesomeness1212 awesomeness1212
item.description:

when i load it, i got this message

at java.lang.Class.getDeclaredMethod(Class.java:1937)
